name: NSGrammaticalNumber
desc: A representation of grammatical number, used for inflecting strings.

items.name: case zero
items.desc: Zero persons or things, as used for a grammatical number.

items.name: case singular
items.desc: A single person or thing, as used for a grammatical number.

items.name: case plural
items.desc: Multiple persons or things, as used for a grammatical number.

items.name: case pluralTwo
items.desc: Two persons or things, as used for a grammatical number.

items.name: case pluralFew
items.desc: A small number of persons or things, as used for a grammatical number.

items.name: case pluralMany
items.desc: A large number of persons or things, as used for a grammatical number.

items.name: case notSet
items.desc: A value that indicates the number is unset.
